desc: Tracey Packaging carries a variety of Industrial Marking and Bag Closing & Weighing products for sale. A highly praised company for product pricing & services.

layout.text:
THE INDUSTRY STANDARD
& YOUR FAVORITE MARKERS
GP-X Classic makes weather and fade-resistance marks on: porous and non-porous surfaces, metal, wood, corrugated, rubber, plastic, glass and more.
Providing packaging & marking products for the food & feed industries, military, medical facilities & more.
